mapper.select: SELECT student_no AS studentNo, dept_no AS deptNo, student_name AS studentName, student_state AS studentState, student_address AS studentAddress, student_phone AS studentPhone, student_birth AS studentBirth, student_img AS studentImg, student_email AS studentEmail FROM student WHERE student_no = #{studentNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE student SET student_pw = #{studentPw}, student_name = #{studentName}, student_state = #{studentState}, student_address = #{studentAddress}, student_phone = #{studentPhone}, student_birth = #{studentBirth}, student_img = #{studentImg}, student_email = #{studentEmail} WHERE student_no = #{studentNo}
